title: I have problem with launching matches... it says: DirectX and drivers are not actualized... PLS HELP
body: I have problem with launching matches... it says: DirectX and drivers are not actualized... PLS HELP

replies.body: Double check that you've got the latest directx drivers just in case you might have missed an update here or there. You can use [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq3) to see how to do so if you're a little unsure, but I'd also suggest running through the other steps on that guide too while you're there.
